verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> will be sung <S%H7891><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> "We have a strong <S%H5797><s%> city; <S%H5892><s%> He sets <S%H7896><s%> up walls <S%H2346><s%> and ramparts <S%H2426><s%> for security. <S%H3444><s%>
"Open <S%H6605><s%> the gates, <S%H8179><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> may enter, <S%H935><s%> The one that remains <S%H8104><s%> faithful. <S%H529><s%>
"The steadfast <S%H5564><s%> of mind <S%H3336><s%> Thou wilt keep <S%H5341><s%> in perfect <S%H7965><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> he trusts <S%H982><s%> in Thee.
"Trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forever, <S%H5703><s%> For in God <S%H3050><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [we have] an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> Rock. <S%H6697><s%>

"For He has brought <S%H7817><s%> low <S%H7817><s%> those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> the unassailable <S%H7682><s%> city; <S%H7151><s%> He lays <S%H8213><s%> it low, <S%H8213><s%> He lays <S%H8213><s%> it low <S%H8213><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> He casts <S%H5060><s%> it to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
"The foot <S%H7272><s%> will trample <S%H7429><s%> it, The feet <S%H7272><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> the steps <S%H6471><s%> of the helpless. <S%H1800><s%>"

The way <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is smooth; <S%H4339><s%> O Upright <S%H3477><s%> One, <S%H3477><s%> make <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> level. <S%H6424><s%>

Indeed, <S%H637><s%> [while following] the way <S%H734><s%> of Thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> We have waited <S%H6960><s%> for Thee eagerly; <S%H6960><s%> Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> even Thy memory, <S%H2143><s%> is the desire <S%H8378><s%> of [our] souls. <S%H5315><s%>

At night <S%H3915><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> longs <S%H183><s%> for Thee, Indeed, <S%H637><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me seeks <S%H7836><s%> Thee diligently; <S%H7836><s%> For when <S%H9201><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> experiences Thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> The inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

[Though] the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is shown <S%H2603><s%> favor, <S%H2603><s%> He does not learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> He deals <S%H5765><s%> unjustly <S%H5765><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness, <S%H5228><s%> And does not perceive <S%H7200><s%> the majesty <S%H1348><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> is lifted <S%H7311><s%> up [yet] they do not see <S%H2372><s%> it. They see <S%H2372><s%> [Thy] zeal <S%H7068><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> and are put <S%H954><s%> to shame; <S%H954><s%> Indeed, <S%H637><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> Thine enemies. <S%H6862><s%>

Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou wilt establish <S%H8239><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for us, Since <S%H3588><s%> Thou hast also <S%H1571><s%> performed <S%H6466><s%> for us all <S%H3605><s%> our works. <S%H4639><s%>

O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> other masters <S%H113><s%> besides <S%H2108><s%> Thee have ruled <S%H1166><s%> us; [But] through Thee alone <S%H905><s%> we confess <S%H2142><s%> Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>

The dead <S%H4191><s%> will not live, <S%H2421><s%> the departed <S%H7496><s%> spirits <S%H7496><s%> will not rise; <S%H6965><s%> Therefore <S%H3651><s%> Thou hast punished <S%H6485><s%> and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, And Thou hast wiped out all <S%H6><s%> remembrance <S%H3605><s%> of them.

Thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> Thou art glorified; <S%H3513><s%> Thou hast extended <S%H7368><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the borders <S%H7099><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>
O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> they sought <S%H6485><s%> Thee in distress; <S%H9496><s%> They could only whisper <S%H3908><s%> a prayer, <S%H3908><s%> Thy chastening <S%H4148><s%> was upon them.

As the pregnant <S%H2030><s%> woman <S%H2030><s%> approaches <S%H7126><s%> [the time] to give <S%H3205><s%> birth, <S%H3205><s%> She writhes <S%H9123><s%> [and] cries <S%H2199><s%> out in her labor <S%H2256><s%> pains, <S%H2256><s%> Thus <S%H3651><s%> were we before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Thee, O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

We were pregnant, <S%H2029><s%> we writhed <S%H9123><s%> [in labor], We gave <S%H3205><s%> birth, <S%H3205><s%> as it were, [only] to wind. <S%H7307><s%> We could not accomplish <S%H6213><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> for the earth <S%H776><s%> Nor <S%H1077><s%> were inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> born. <S%H5307><s%>

Your dead <S%H4191><s%> will live; <S%H2421><s%> Their corpses <S%H5038><s%> will rise. <S%H6965><s%> You who lie <S%H7931><s%> in the dust, <S%H6083><s%> awake <S%H9516><s%> and shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, <S%H7442><s%> For your dew <S%H2919><s%> is as the dew <S%H2919><s%> of the dawn, <S%H9004><s%> And the earth <S%H776><s%> will give <S%H5307><s%> birth <S%H5307><s%> to the departed <S%H7496><s%> spirits. <S%H7496><s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into your rooms, <S%H2315><s%> And close <S%H5462><s%> your doors <S%H9088><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> you; Hide <S%H2247><s%> for a little <S%H4592><s%> while, <S%H7281><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> indignation <S%H2195><s%> runs <S%H5674><s%> [its] course. <S%H5674><s%>

For behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is about to come <S%H3318><s%> out from His place <S%H4725><s%> To punish <S%H6485><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> And the earth <S%H776><s%> will reveal <S%H1540><s%> her bloodshed, <S%H1818><s%> And will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> her slain. <S%H2026><s%>
